price: Isaan ishee irraa nyaatanii garaalee isaanii ishee irraa guuttatu.
arabic: فَإِنَّهُمۡ لَأٓكِلُونَ مِنۡهَا فَمَالِـُٔونَ مِنۡهَا ٱلۡبُطُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fa-innahum laākilūna min'hā famāliūna min'hā al-buṭūna
